generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, occupied by multiple vehicles and bordered by sidewalks and vegetation.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the right side of the road, adjacent to the traffic lane, with a cyclist riding on it.
- building: Several multi-story buildings are visible along the street, including a prominent white building on the right side.
- vegetation: Numerous trees with green foliage are present along the road, both on the left and right sides.
- terrain: Grass areas are visible along the edges of the road, particularly on the left side and near the sidewalk.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the buildings, appearing overcast or cloudy.
- person: A person is visible on the right side of the road, riding a bicycle.
- rider: The person riding the bicycle is classified as a rider.
- car: Multiple cars are visible in the image, including a black car directly ahead, a silver convertible on the right, and several other vehicles in traffic.
- truck: A blue truck is visible in the middle of the road, ahead of the viewer's vehicle.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible on the right side of the road, above the traffic lanes.
- traffic sign: A triangular traffic sign (yield sign) is visible on the left side of the road, mounted on a pole.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and traffic signs.
- bicycle: A bicycle is visible on the right side of the road, being ridden by a person.
